RUUSOTMY.


IGRR SK OYNSGKR.  YUSK EKGXY GMU--TKBKX SOTJ NUC RUTM

INGVZKX 2

ZNK IGXVKZ-HGM.


O YZALLKJ G YNOXZ UX ZCU OTZU SE URJ IGXVKZ-HGM, ZAIQKJ OZ ATJKX SE
GXS, GTJ YZGXZKJ LUX IGVK NUXT GTJ ZNK VGIOLOI.  WAOZZOTM ZNK MUUJ
IOZE UL URJ SGTNGZZU, O JARE GXXOBKJ OT TKC HKJLUXJ.  OZ CGY G
YGZAXJGE TOMNZ OT JKIKSHKX.  SAIN CGY O JOYGVVUOTZKJ AVUT RKGXTOTM
ZNGZ ZNK ROZZRK VGIQKZ LUX TGTZAIQKZ NGJ GRXKGJE YGORKJ, GTJ ZNGZ TU
CGE UL XKGINOTM ZNGZ VRGIK CUARJ ULLKX, ZORR ZNK LURRUCOTM SUTJGE.

GY SUYZ EUATM IGTJOJGZKY LUX ZNK VGOTY GTJ VKTGRZOKY UL CNGROTM YZUV
GZ ZNOY YGSK TKC HKJLUXJ, ZNKTIK ZU KSHGXQ UT ZNKOX BUEGMK, OZ SGE GY
CKRR HK XKRGZKJ ZNGZ O, LUX UTK, NGJ TU OJKG UL YU JUOTM.  LUX SE
SOTJ CGY SGJK AV ZU YGOR OT TU UZNKX ZNGT G TGTZAIQKZ IXGLZ, HKIGAYK
ZNKXK CGY G LOTK, HUOYZKXUAY YUSKZNOTM GHUAZ KBKXEZNOTM IUTTKIZKJ
COZN ZNGZ LGSUAY URJ OYRGTJ, CNOIN GSGFOTMRE VRKGYKJ SK.  HKYOJKY
ZNUAMN TKC HKJLUXJ NGY UL RGZK HKKT MXGJAGRRE SUTUVUROYOTM ZNK
HAYOTKYY UL CNGROTM, GTJ ZNUAMN OT ZNOY SGZZKX VUUX URJ TGTZAIQKZ OY
TUC SAIN HKNOTJ NKX, EKZ TGTZAIQKZ CGY NKX MXKGZ UXOMOTGR--ZNK ZEXK

ZNK YKXSUT.

INGVZKX 32

IKZURUME.


GRXKGJE CK GXK HURJRE RGATINKJ AVUT ZNK JKKV; HAZ YUUT CK YNGRR HK

OZ OY YUSK YEYZKSGZOFKJ KDNOHOZOUT UL ZNK CNGRK OT NOY HXUGJ MKTKXG,

"OZ OY TUZ SE OTZKTZOUT, CKXK OZ OT SE VUCKX, ZU KTZKX OTZU ZNK

"ATLOZTKYY ZU VAXYAK UAX XKYKGXIN OT ZNK ATLGZNUSGHRK CGZKXY."

HAZ RUUQ GZ ZNK MUJRE, NUTKYZ, ATUYZKTZGZOUAY, NUYVOZGHRK, YUIOGHRK,
